thread.title: Toys ‘R’ Us, iHeartMedia Haunt Buyout Firms Sitting on Trillion-Dollar Cash Pile

author: Miriam Gottfried
title: Toys ‘R’ Us, iHeartMedia Haunt Buyout Firms Sitting on Trillion-Dollar Cash Pile
text:
It has been more than a decade since private-equity firms went on a buyout binge on the eve of the financial crisis, but as the recent bankruptcies of Toys “R” Us Inc. and iHeartMedia Inc. show, many of the deals continue to haunt their owners and are forcing them to find new ways to spend an epic pile of cash.
Private-equity firms are sitting on more than $1 trillion in uninvested capital, data provider Preqin estimates, which they will need to spend if they want to earn the hefty fees they collect on investment gains.
